quote: Not everything in life is black and white but we like to make building a successful e-commerce website as simple as black and white.
description: After a very successful 2010, subsidiary of the Porter and Woodman Group, Chalkboards UK asked us to redevelop the previous e-commerce website we designed and built for them. They were also interested in incorporating any other recommendations we had.
tsdInfo:
TSD develops large-scale, mission-critical applications for enterprise.

We are excited by being involved in challenging problems that others may steer away from; solving big challenges with our highly skilled developers and the pedigree of the technologies we use.

We are the technical integration partner for service providers
